attributes.action: Decrease the current classified age of adults to the age of 16 and over.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give the citizens of the UK the right to be classified as an adult from the age of 16. Give them the rights that 17 years olds have and the right to vote.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/adultage16/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
